recipe.name: Grilled Basil Chicken Sandwiches
recipe.notes: Coated with a simple basil mayo, the chicken in this open-face sandwich would also be good chopped and tossed into a salad or served alongside rice and fresh vegetables.
recipe.preparation: 1. Heat grill to high (450-550 degrees). Reserve 4 basil leaves. Whirl mayonnaise, remaining basil, garlic, vinegar, salt, and pepper in a food processor until smooth.2. Sandwich chicken breasts between 2 pieces of plastic wrap and pound with a mallet until 1/4 inch thick.3. Grill chicken, basting each side with some of mayo mixture and turning as needed, until cooked through and well browned, about 8 minutes.4. Brush one side of bread with a little mayo mixture; grill bread on both sides. 5. Lay chicken on mayo side of bread. Top each remaining sandwich with a tomato slice and a basil leaf and serve the remaining mayo on the side.
